Content:: Georgs Andrejevs (30 October 1932[1] – 16 July 2022)[2] was a Latvian politician and Member of the European Parliament for the Latvian Way party; part of the European Liberal Democrat and Reform Party.[3] He was the Foreign Minister of Latvia from 1992 to 1994.[4] Andrejevs died on 16 July 2022 in Riga, Latvia at the age of 89.[2]  This article about a Member of the European Parliament for Latvia is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a Latvian politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
